messages.title: IT'S TIME FOR A CHANGE IN BURY ST EDMUNDS
messages.content: This is a once in a generation chance to transform our country. I am part of our community and I want to represent you in Parliament

keyPolicies.policyDescription: End fuel poverty and ensure warm homes for all. Will create 450,000 new energy jobs and make Britain carbon neutral by 2030.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: BREATHING NEW LIFE INTO PUBLIC SERVICES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Repair run-down NHS, sort out chaos in transport system, invest in struggling education system, resolve housing crisis.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: AN ECONOMY THAT WORKS FOR EVERYONE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: End in-work poverty within the first term of office and stop unfair zero-hour contracts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: FREE SOCIAL CARE FOR THE ELDERLY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Education should be free for all

issues.economy: End in-work poverty, stop zero-hour contracts.
issues.education: Scrap tuition fees, invest in struggling education system.
issues.environment: LABOUR'S GREEN NEW DEAL - 450,000 new energy jobs, carbon neutral by 2030.
issues.health: Repair run-down NHS, free NHS car parking.
issues.socialWelfare: Free social care for the elderly with a National Care Service.

housing.content: Resolve the worst housing crisis in generations.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've lived in Suffolk for 34 years, mostly in Bury St Edmunds. I was brought up in a working-class family with strong values of hard work, respect and decency and have brought up my children and grandchildren to share these values. I am not a career politician but a democrat who believes that democratic decisions should be respected, even when uncomfortable.

endorsements.endorsement: I've known Cliff for many years and I know he'll do a good job for us. I'll definitely be voting Labour because I believe in Labour values and I'm certain that Cliff is the one who will represent them.
